statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.InfoNoticeItemID , AA.InfoNoticeValue
FROM dbo.BGGoodsInfoNotice AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.GoodsID = #GoodsID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.InfoNoticeItemID , AA.InfoNoticeValue
FROM dbo.BGGoodsInfoNotice AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BGGoodsInfoNotice ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, GoodsID, InfoNoticeItemID, InfoNoticeValue ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #GoodsID#, #InfoNoticeItemID#, #InfoNoticeValue# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BGGoodsInfoNotice SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, GoodsID = #GoodsID# , InfoNoticeItemID= #InfoNoticeItemID# , InfoNoticeValue = #InfoNoticeValue# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B2.SortOrder, B2.ID) AS RowNo , CC.ID , CC.CreateDate , CC.CreateBy , CC.CreateByName , CC.UpdateDate , CC.UpdateBy , CC.UpdateByName
, CC.GoodsID as GoodsID , B2.ID as InfoNoticeItemID , B2.ItemName as InfoNoticeItemName , CC.InfoNoticeValue as InfoNoticeValue
FROM dbo.BGCategory AA INNER JOIN dbo.BGInfoNotice B1 ON AA.InfoNoticeID = B1.ID INNER JOIN dbo.BGInfoNoticeItem B2 ON B1.ID = B2.InfoNoticeID LEFT JOIN dbo.BGGoodsInfoNotice CC ON B2.ID = CC.InfoNoticeItemID AND CC.GoodsID = #GoodsID# WHERE AA.ID = #CategoryID# AND B1.UseYn = 'Y' AND B2.UseYn = 'Y' ORDER BY RowNo
